scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.test: npm run format:check && npm run test:types && npm run db:clean && npm run db:run && npm run test:generated-types && npm run test:run && npm run db:clean && node test/smoke.cjs && node test/smoke.mjs
scripts.test:ci: npm run format:check && npm run test:types:ci && npm run db:clean && npm run db:run && npm run test:generated-types && npm run test:run && npm run db:clean && node test/smoke.cjs && node test/smoke.mjs
scripts.test:generated-types: npm run db:generate-test-types && git diff --exit-code test/types.generated.ts || (echo '❌ Generated types are not up to date. Run npm run db:generate-test-types.' && exit 1)
scripts.test:update: npm run db:clean && npm run db:run && npm run db:generate-test-types && jest --runInBand --updateSnapshot && npm run db:clean
scripts.db:run: cd test/db && docker compose up --detach && wait-for-localhost 3000
scripts.db:generate-test-types: cd test/db && docker compose up --detach && wait-for-localhost 8080 && wait-for-localhost 3000 && curl --location 'http://0.0.0.0:8080/generators/typescript?included_schemas=public,personal&detect_one_to_one_relationships=true' > ../types.generated.ts && node ../../scripts/update-json-type.js && cd ../../ && npm run format
